Title: How to use AI models in your GitHub Actions workflows
Author: GitHub
Description:
Ready to let AI handle some of your tedious repo management? By adding a simple permission to your workflow files, you can now call powerful AI models from GitHub Actions. See how this enables AI-powered branching, automated documentation with Project Bloom, and other practical use cases that can save your team hours of time.

#AI #GitHubModels #GitHubActions

00:00 - Introduction 00:13 - Bug Reproduction Checker 01:32 - Changelog Generator 02:20 - Weekly Issue Summaries 03:00 - Project Bloom 03:48 - Get Started
